alert.note: Alert for Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 2:53PM MDT until May 24 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tooele County in northern Utah... * Until 345 PM MDT * At 253 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Delle, or 21 miles northwest of Grantsville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Delle. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 64 and 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
